title: 24 Hours Stream and 1v1 Tournament

embed.description: OCE | Practice in Norms | Songrequests | !24hr for info about an upcoming event!

body:
on June 27-28 I will be running a 24 hour stream with a 1v1 tournament included in it!
There will be a bunch of giveaways and League mini games for viewers to play on the stream 
For more detailed information check out the links below

If you are interested in participating in the 1v1 Tournament please read the rules and message the SLaTerStream  facebook (https://www.facebook.com/slaterstream )  or Twitch (http://www.twitch.tv/slaterstream) with your IGN & Rank 

There will also be a Competition of the Mini game "Brothers" If you wish to enter a team please read the rules and message me with both players IGNs. 5 of the teams entered will be selected at random to play

All other mini games will be entered into on the day

schedule - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLTEJpY3pMLXBuVmc/view?usp=sharing

Giveaways - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLRmp2WTdUcU9ZRDg/view?usp=sharing

1v1 Tournament Rules - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLWDZHNXJXN0x1bjQ/view?usp=sharing

Brothers (Mini game rules) - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLbTdnM2txZzBqWlk/view?usp=sharing

Defend the King (Mini game rules) - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLOGRCTmZ4OGl4Rm8/view?usp=sharing

Base Race (Mini game rules) - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLaEtRLTR5eE4tcnc/view?usp=sharing

Hide & Seek (Mini game rules) - https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwuon0nbyHsLS0ZTVVpaNnBUUVE/view?usp=sharing

Hope to see lots of you during the stream <3
